subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hi everyone !
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Hi Neli. Welcome to the group. I think you will find most people are also trying to find out either who is speaking or how its possible. Thats a journey and a conclusion we each have to do on our own. Theres alot of nice people here who are willing to help when they can.

As for if they are alien spirits, I can only say personally not all claim to have been human. Some claim they were never born here or even have names like we do. While others are people I knew in life who have crossed over and still send validation that they are around.

Good luck on your journey it will be an interesting one!

Misty


--- On Mon, 11/17/08, neli_nelis <neli_nelis@...> wrote:

> From: neli_nelis <neli_nelis@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Hi everyone !
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Monday, November 17, 2008, 4:18 AM
> Hello
> 
> I'm a newbie at this place and would like to know the
> meaning of some 
> of my EVPs, as I have many of them, one of the last ones
> says: "COME 
> WITH US, RECALL" then I asked who were they, and they
> told me "Ummitta 
> people", I have seen ufos, but I don't know if
> they can give messages 
> as the ones of EVP, the very last one, says: CAN YOU HEAR
> ME ? Wow ! I 
> want to know who is trying to communicate with me, as the
> voice is so 
> human that it doesn't seems to be a spirit, although
> they speak with 
> low voice. But I am very astonished with the one of
> "come with us" 
> and "Recall" I don't know what do I have to
> recall, I do my EVPs with 
> my cell phone, I have time with this practice but lately
> the 
> communications are so clear that I doubt that they can be
> of the spirit 
> world, can some of you help me to understand the message
> please ???
> 
> Kind regards
> Neli
